attributes.action: pay student nurses when working on wards
attributes.additional_details: As the Government have now made nurses  pay for their training when they work on the wards as a part of their training they should be paid as every one who works has a right to be paid even if it an apprentice rate as if they are training to be a nurse they are  as a part of the learning process as apprentices when working on the job
attributes.background: As of 2017 trainee nurses have to pay for the tuition and have stopped receiving a  bursary so should be paid when working on wards
